Class NutrimentRulesBo

java.lang.Object
  at.easydiet.teamc.model.NutrimentRulesBo

public class NutrimentRulesBo
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a ruleset of NutrimentRules for creating new recipes with specified goals.

addParameter

public void addParameter(ParameterDefinitionBo parameterdefintion,
                         CheckOperatorBo checkOperatorBo,
                         double value,
                         ParameterDefinitionUnitBo pdu)
                  throws NutrimentRuleException
Creates a new NutrimentRule and adds it to the set.

Parameters:
parameterdefintion - ParameterDefintion of the new NutrimentRule.
checkOperatorBo - CheckOperator of the new NutrimentRule.
value - Value of the new NutrimentRule.
pdu - Unit of the new NutrimentRule.
Throws:
NutrimentRuleException - if the new NutrimentRule contradicts the existing NutrimentRules of the set.

public java.util.List<NutrimentRuleBo> checkRecipe(RecipeBo recipe)
Checks a given recipe with all NutrimentRules of this NutrimentRuleSet and returns them in a List.

Returns:

validate

private boolean validate(NutrimentRuleBo currRule)
                  throws NutrimentRuleException
Validates if the NutrimentRule contradticts the existing NutrimentRuleSet.

Parameters:
currRule - Rule to validate.
Returns:
true if the rule is valid and not a duplicate.
Throws:
NutrimentRuleException - if the new NutrimentRule contradicts the existing NutrimentRules of the set.
